events.title: Speaker Series: Lauren Zakalik
events.description: WFAA Reporter Lauren Zakalik hosts this in-depth discussion on important issues facing reporters and broadcasters today. Meet us in room FA 258

events.title: BEA Valentines Bake Sale
events.description: BEA will be hosting a Valentines Day Bake Sale! We will be located at the UC Mall and all the proceeds will benefit BEA UTA Chapter in raising money for BEA Conference in Austin.

events.title: BEA General Body Meeting
events.description: Broadcast Education Association UTA Chapter  last meeting of the Fall 18 semester. Joining us as an honored guest speaker, Kennard Wells

events.title: Film Screening: Left on Pearl
events.location: Lone Star Auditorium, Maverick Activity Center
events.description: join us for a film, conversation, and food in the warm confines of the Lone Star Theater (in the MAC) tonight at 7 p.m.. And, it’s all FREE

events.title: Keith Solis with KRNB
events.description: Join us in FA 122 at 12pm, Wednesday, May 2. Smooth R&B 105.7 Music Director Keith Solis will answer your questions about broadcasting in radio today.
